analysis.key_quote: The proposed change in regulation makes it highly more likely that successful performance in these positions will become too subjective to ensure non-biased decisions in firing and hiring, compromising the quality and integrity of these critical government roles.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concern that the proposed rule will lead to subjective decision-making in hiring and firing, which undermines the merit-based system and could result in politicization, thus opposing the rule.
